original_text: The priest will bring the gift to the Lord. That is to make things right. Then the Lord will forgive that person who did the sin. The person did not know that he had done a wrong thing.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 부지중에 범죄한 사람이 부지중에 여호와 앞에 범한 죄를 위하여 속죄하여 그 죄를 속할지니 그리하면 사함을 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: The priest will bring the gift to the Lord.
That is to make things right.
Then the Lord will forgive that person
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주께서 그 사람을 용서하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: that he had done a wrong thing.
